info.title: Tributary AI services for DeepLake
info.description: Universal DeepLake vector database service with HTTP and gRPC APIs

schema.title: Response Readiness Check Api V1 Health Ready Get
Response Liveness Check Api V1 Health Live Get
Response Get Prometheus Metrics Api V1 Metrics Prometheus Get
Response Get Service Stats Api V1 Stats Get

post.description: Create a new dataset.

get.description: List all datasets for the current tenant.

schema.title: Response List Datasets Api V1 Datasets  Get

post.description: Insert a single vector into the dataset.

schema.title: Response Insert Vector Api V1 Datasets  Dataset Id  Vectors  Post
Response List Vectors Api V1 Datasets  Dataset Id  Vectors  Get

post.description: Insert multiple vectors into the dataset.

delete.description: Delete multiple vectors by their IDs.

get.description: Get a specific vector by ID.

post.description: Search for similar vectors using vector similarity.
Search for similar vectors using text query (converts text to embeddings).

Perform hybrid search combining vector similarity and text search.

Hybrid search combines the strengths of both vector similarity search 
(semantic understanding) and text search (keyword matching) to provide 
more comprehensive and accurate search results.
Search across multiple datasets and merge results.
Import vectors from CSV or JSON/JSONL file

get.description: Get the status of an import job

post.description: Export vectors to CSV or JSON/JSONL file

parameters.name: format

schema.description: Export format: csv, json, or jsonl
schema.title: Format

parameters.description: Export format: csv, json, or jsonl

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of vectors to export
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of vectors to export

get.description: Get the status of an export job
Download the exported file for a completed export job

post.description: Remove old completed jobs and their associated files (admin only)

parameters.name: max_age_hours

schema.description: Maximum age of jobs to keep (hours)
schema.title: Max Age Hours

parameters.description: Maximum age of jobs to keep (hours)

post.description: Create or update index for a dataset.

schema.title: Response Create Or Update Index Api V1 Datasets  Dataset Id  Index Post

get.description: Get index statistics for a dataset.

schema.title: Response Get Index Stats Api V1 Datasets  Dataset Id  Index Get

delete.description: Delete index and revert to flat search.

schema.title: Response Delete Index Api V1 Datasets  Dataset Id  Index Delete

post.description: Optimize index parameters for target recall.

schema.title: Response Optimize Index Api V1 Datasets  Dataset Id  Index Optimize Post

get.description: Get current usage statistics for the tenant.
Get current rate limits for the tenant.

post.description: Update rate limits for a specific tenant (admin only).

schema.title: Response Update Tenant Rate Limits Api V1 Admin Rate Limits  Target Tenant Id  Post

post.description: Reset rate limits for a specific tenant (admin only).

schema.title: Response Reset Tenant Rate Limits Api V1 Admin Rate Limits  Target Tenant Id  Reset Post

get.description: Get usage statistics for any tenant (admin only).
Get rate limiting system health (admin only).

schema.title: Response Get Rate Limit Health Api V1 Admin Rate Limits Health Get

post.description: Test rate limiting for current tenant.

schema.title: Response Test Rate Limit Api V1 Test Rate Limit Post

BaseResponse.title: BaseResponse
BaseResponse.description: Base response model with common fields.

index_type.title: Index Type
index_type.description: Index type: default, flat, hnsw, ivf

fusion_method.title: Fusion Method
fusion_method.description: Result fusion method: weighted_sum, reciprocal_rank_fusion, comb_sum, comb_mnz, borda_count

index_type.title: Index Type
index_type.description: Index type: hnsw, ivf, or flat

force_rebuild.title: Force Rebuild
force_rebuild.description: Force rebuild even if index exists

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Advanced metadata filters - supports simple dict, complex expressions, or SQL-like strings

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Vector metadata - supports any JSON-serializable data

APIKeyHeader.name: Authorization
APIKeyHeader.description: API Key authentication. Enter your API key directly (without 'ApiKey' prefix). The system will automatically format it as 'ApiKey your-key'
